entities.name: spider
entities.description: The spider is described as twitching horribly and jerking violently. It is also mentioned that if it could have given voice, it would have been screaming.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is described as not removing his wand during the incident with the spider.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as saying 'Stop it!' in a shrill voice.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as looking around at Hermione and following her gaze to Neville.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as being looked at by Harry after Hermione's comment.

relationships.description: Moody did not remove his wand, and the spider started to shudder and jerk more violently.
Hermione was looking at Neville when she said 'Stop it!'
Harry followed Hermione's gaze to Neville
